title: What's your role?
body: Most of us have a preferred role and I'm curious what Oce is filled with. So what's your role? I personally prefer jungling!

replies.body: I fill, so I guess that makes me a support main
You missed the 'I don't want to step on anyone's toes so I'll fill" option.
If I did that I would've needed to put the 'Mid or feed and aft' option.
That's just the long version for just "mid"
No it's mid and feed. THere is a difference.
No one mains Top because you never get Top without 8 people calling it every game and one of them instalocking.
If Top and Mid are getting so little votes, why do most normal game chatrooms get spammed with "TOP TOP TOP TOP" and "MID MID MID MID"
i prefer top lane then adc

I try to do all roles, but I'm really bad at ADC and jungle. To this day, though, my greedy mid laner instincts still get the better of me and I tend to forget I'm not 2 levels ahead of everyone if I'm not in mid lane (No joke, A slightly fed top laner is the same level as an average mid laner for some reason, maybe the shape of the lane naturally allows exp to come in more quickly?)
